info.title: AuthorizationManagementClient
info.description: Role based access control provides you a way to apply granular level policy administration down to individual resources or resource groups. These operations enable you to get deny assignments. A deny assignment describes the set of actions on resources that are denied for Azure Active Directory users.

get.description: Gets all deny assignments for the subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all deny assignments at or above the scope. Use $filter=denyAssignmentName eq '{name}' to search deny assignments by name at specified scope. Use $filter=principalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. Use $filter=gdprExportPrincipalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. This filter is different from the principalId filter as it returns not only those deny assignments that contain the specified principal is the Principals list but also those deny assignments that contain the specified principal is the ExcludePrincipals list. Additionally, when gdprExportPrincipalId filter is used, only the deny assignment name and description properties are returned.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of deny assignments.

parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: api-version

parameters.name: $filter

Use $filter=principalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. Use $filter=gdprExportPrincipalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. get.description: Gets deny assignments for a resource.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceProviderNamespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the resource provider.

parameters.name: parentResourcePath
parameters.description: The parent resource identity.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: The resource type of the resource.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the resource to get deny assignments for.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all deny assignments at or above the scope. Use $filter=denyAssignmentName eq '{name}' to search deny assignments by name at specified scope. Use $filter=principalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. Use $filter=gdprExportPrincipalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. This filter is different from the principalId filter as it returns not only those deny assignments that contain the specified principal is the Principals list but also those deny assignments that contain the specified principal is the ExcludePrincipals list. Additionally, when gdprExportPrincipalId filter is used, only the deny assignment name and description properties are returned.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of deny assignments.

get.description: Gets a deny assignment by ID.

parameters.name: denyAssignmentId
parameters.description: The fully qualified deny assignment ID. For example, use the format, /subscriptions/{guid}/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/denyAssignments/{denyAssignmentId} for subscription level deny assignments, or /providers/Microsoft.Authorization/denyAssignments/{denyAssignmentId} for tenant level deny assignments.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

get.description: Gets deny assignments for a scope.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the deny assignments.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all deny assignments at or above the scope. Use $filter=denyAssignmentName eq '{name}' to search deny assignments by name at specified scope. Use $filter=principalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. Use $filter=gdprExportPrincipalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. This filter is different from the principalId filter as it returns not only those deny assignments that contain the specified principal is the Principals list but also those deny assignments that contain the specified principal is the ExcludePrincipals list. Additionally, when gdprExportPrincipalId filter is used, only the deny assignment name and description properties are returned.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of deny assignments.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the deny assignment.

parameters.name: denyAssignmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the deny assignment to get.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the deny assignment.

denyAssignmentName.description: Return deny assignment with specified name.

gdprExportPrincipalId.description: Return all deny assignments where the specified principal is listed either in the principals list or exclude principals list of deny assignments.

principalId.description: Return all deny assignments where the specified principal is listed in the principals list of deny assignments.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

actions.description: Actions to which the deny assignment does not grant access.

dataActions.description: Data actions to which the deny assignment does not grant access.

notActions.description: Actions to exclude from that the deny assignment does not grant access.

notDataActions.description: Data actions to exclude from that the deny assignment does not grant access.

denyAssignmentName.description: The display name of the deny assignment.

description.description: The description of the deny assignment.

doNotApplyToChildScopes.description: Determines if the deny assignment applies to child scopes. Default value is false.

excludePrincipals.description: Array of principals to which the deny assignment does not apply.

isSystemProtected.description: Specifies whether this deny assignment was created by Azure and cannot be edited or deleted.

permissions.description: An array of permissions that are denied by the deny assignment.

principals.description: Array of principals to which the deny assignment applies.

id.description: Object ID of the Azure AD principal (user, group, or service principal) to which the deny assignment applies. An empty guid '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as principal id and principal type as 'Everyone' represents all users, groups and service principals.

type.description: Type of object represented by principal id (user, group, or service principal). An empty guid '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as principal id and principal type as 'Everyone' represents all users, groups and service principals.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.

FilterParameter.name: $filter
FilterParameter.description: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all deny assignments at or above the scope. Use $filter=denyAssignmentName eq '{name}' to search deny assignments by name at specified scope. Use $filter=principalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. Use $filter=gdprExportPrincipalId eq '{id}' to return all deny assignments at, above and below the scope for the specified principal. This filter is different from the principalId filter as it returns not only those deny assignments that contain the specified principal is the Principals list but also those deny assignments that contain the specified principal is the ExcludePrincipals list. Additionally, when gdprExportPrincipalId filter is used, only the deny assignment name and description properties are returned.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

ResourceProviderNamespaceParameter.name: resourceProviderNamespace
ResourceProviderNamespaceParameter.description: The namespace of the resource provider.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.
